mapper.select: select confidential_client.id, confidential_client.password, confidential_client.created_at, client.id as client_id, client.redirect_URI as client_redirect_URI, client.created_at as client_created_at, scope.id as client_scope_id, scope.name as client_scope_name, scope.created_at as client_scope_created_at, response_type.id as client_response_type_id, response_type.name as client_response_type_name, response_type.created_at as client_response_type_created_at, response_type.updated_at as client_response_type_updated_at from confidential_client join client on client.id = confidential_client.client_id join client_scopes on client_scopes.client_id = client.id join scope on scope.id = client_scopes.scope_id join client_response_type on client_response_type.client_id = client.id join response_type on response_type.id = client_response_type.response_type_id where client.id = #{clientId}
